thumb.title: LaVine Law Firm Criminal Defense Lawyers
thumb.description: At LaVine Law Firm, we are dedicated to providing the highest level of legal representation for a full range of criminal defense cases. Serving the state of Texas, with a focus on the Houston area, we will aggressively fight for your rights and freedoms. We fully investigate the facts and circumstances of each case, building a personalized defense strategy. Whether you are facing charges for DWI, drug offenses, domestic violence, or any other criminal offense, we have the skill, knowledge, and dedication to help you. We will work tirelessly to help you navigate the complexities of the criminal justice system and achieve the best possible outcome in your case.LaVine Law Firm Criminal Defense Lawyers2500 E T.C. Jester Blvd, Suite 160, Houston, TX 77008(713) 965-7305https://www.lavinelawfirm.com/
